author: hwright
msg: * subversion/svn/main.c
(main): Remove some superfluous nesting, add some whitespace, and fix
some indentation.  No logic changes.

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/svn/main.c
(main): Break a long line.

author: lgo
msg: Adjust the help message of 'switch' to show it now supports peg revisions.
* subversion/svn/main.c
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Add PEGREV definition to switch help text.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/getopt_tests_data/svn_help_log_switch_stdout
Update the corresponding regression test.

author: markphip
msg: Followup to r27875, modified diff unit tests to show some problems in
current code.
1) Existing test for trailing slash and relative paths was not
correctly passing a trailing slash.  Now that it does, the test
fails.
2) The new relativeToPath diff code does not work when the file has
svn:eol-style set.
[ in subversion/bindings/javahl/ ]
* tests/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/BasicTests.java
(testDiff): Reworked the tests to run in a loop, with and without
svn:eol-style set.  Also fixed a problem where a trailing slash
was not passed when it the test said it was supposed to be passed.

author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'mergeinfoless-copies' branch, merge outstanding changes from trunk.
Merged /trunk:r27848-27925
Note to self: if you *know* you have a feature branch going on, don't do
massive code reorganization in overlapping areas on the trunk.
